result.eng: The death penalty was abolished in 1976.
result.ga: ba sa bhliain 1976 a cuireadh pionós an bháis ar ceal
result.orig: Ba sa bhliain 1976 a cuireadh pionós an bháis ar ceal
result.html: ba sa bhliain 1976 a cuireadh pionós an bháis ar cealThe death penalty was abolished in 1976.
result.ponchtml: ba sa ḃliain 1976 a cuireaḋ pionós an ḃáis ar cealThe death penalty was abolished in 1976.

result.eng: He was ready to take revenge for the death of his father.
result.ga: bhí sé réidh le díoltas a bhaint amach as bás a athar
result.orig: Bhí sé réidh le díoltas a bhaint amach as bás a athar
result.html: bhí sé réidh le díoltas a bhaint amach as bás a atharHe was ready to take revenge for the death of his father.
result.ponchtml: ḃí sé réiḋ le díoltas a ḃaint amaċ as bás a aṫarHe was ready to take revenge for the death of his father.

result.html: fuair sí básShe died.
result.ponchtml: fuair sí básShe died.

result.eng: He wrote memoirs about Nazi death camps.
result.ga: scríobh sé cuimhní cinn faoi champaí báis na naitsithe
result.orig: Scríobh sé cuimhní cinn faoi champaí báis na Naitsithe
result.html: scríobh sé cuimhní cinn faoi champaí báis na naitsitheHe wrote memoirs about Nazi death camps.
result.ponchtml: scríoḃ sé cuiṁní cinn faoi ċampaí báis na naitsiṫeHe wrote memoirs about Nazi death camps.

result.eng: His health started declining and he died.
result.ga: thosaigh an tsláinte ag meath air agus fuair sé bás
result.orig: Thosaigh an tsláinte ag meath air agus fuair sé bás
result.html: thosaigh an tsláinte ag meath air agus fuair sé básHis health started declining and he died.
result.ponchtml: ṫosaiġ an tsláinte ag meaṫ air agus fuair sé básHis health started declining and he died.

result.eng: I am going to die soon.
result.ga: tá mé chun bás a fháil go luath
result.orig: Tá mé chun bás a fháil go luath
result.html: tá mé chun bás a fháil go luathI am going to die soon.
result.ponchtml: tá mé ċun bás a ḟáil go luaṫI am going to die soon.

result.eng: I pity the poor woman who died.
result.ga: tá trua agam don bhean bhocht a fuair bás
result.orig: Tá trua agam don bhean bhocht a fuair bás
result.html: tá trua agam don bhean bhocht a fuair básI pity the poor woman who died.
result.ponchtml: tá trua agam don ḃean ḃoċt a fuair básI pity the poor woman who died.

result.eng: My husband died two years ago.
result.ga: fuair m'fhear céile bás dhá bhliain ó shin
result.orig: Fuair m'fhear céile bás dhá bhliain ó shin
result.html: fuair m'fhear céile bás dhá bhliain ó shinMy husband died two years ago.
result.ponchtml: fuair m'ḟear céile bás ḋá ḃliain ó ẛinMy husband died two years ago.

result.eng: She became afraid of (her own) death.
result.html: tháinig eagla a báis uirthiShe became afraid of (her own) death.
result.ponchtml: ṫáinig eagla a báis uirṫiShe became afraid of (her own) death.

result.ga: fuair sé bás tobann gan choinne
result.orig: Fuair sé bás tobann gan choinne
result.html: fuair sé bás tobann gan choinneHe died suddenly and unexpectedly.
result.ponchtml: fuair sé bás tobann gan ċoinneHe died suddenly and unexpectedly.

result.eng: They would often be in mortal danger.
result.ga: bhíodh siad faoi bhagairt an bháis go minic
result.orig: Bhíodh siad faoi bhagairt an bháis go minic
result.html: bhíodh siad faoi bhagairt an bháis go minicThey would often be in mortal danger.
result.ponchtml: ḃíoḋ siad faoi ḃagairt an ḃáis go minicThey would often be in mortal danger.

result.eng: The former Empire of the USSR was dying.
result.ga: bhí iar-impireacht aontas na bpoblachtaí sóivéadacha sóisialacha ag saothrú an bháis

result.ponchtml: ḃí iar-impireaċt aontas na bpoblaċtaí sóivéadaċa sóisialaċa ag saoṫrú an ḃáisThe former Empire of the USSR was dying.

result.eng: Everybody who ever died in this house.
result.ga: iomlán a bhfuair bás sa teach seo riamh
result.orig: Iomlán a bhfuair bás sa teach seo riamh
result.html: iomlán a bhfuair bás sa teach seo riamhEverybody who ever died in this house.
result.ponchtml: iomlán a ḃfuair bás sa teaċ seo riaṁEverybody who ever died in this house.

result.eng: For the life of you, don't let it get away from you!
result.ga: ar do bhás ná lig uait é
result.orig: Ar do bhás ná lig uait é
result.html: ar do bhás ná lig uait éFor the life of you, don't let it get away from you!
